05764f174d03456037b1be29b77f99e5d6acc583.query:
SELECT
                    `i`.`id` as `id`,
                    MAX(`c`.`id`) as `comic`
                FROM `Item` `i`
                JOIN `Occurrence` `o` ON `o`.`item_id` = `i`.`id`
                JOIN `Comic` `c` ON `c`.`id` = `o`.`comic_id`
                WHERE `c`.`id` < ?
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)
                GROUP BY `i`.`id`

0661da3ca9350633c12e2b696c10655950390624.query:
SELECT
                    `i`.`id`,
                    MIN(`c`.`id`) as `first`,
                    MAX(`c`.`id`) as `last`,
                    COUNT(`c`.`id`) as `count`
                FROM `Item` `i`
                JOIN `Occurrence` `o` ON `o`.`item_id` = `i`.`id`
                JOIN `Comic` `c` ON `c`.`id` = `o`.`comic_id`
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)
                GROUP by `i`.`id`
                ORDER BY `count` DESC

0920be6a560231cf42cb184189a3aef674ebcab1.query:
SELECT * FROM `Comic`
                WHERE (? is NULL OR `is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `is_non_canon` = ?)
                ORDER BY `id` ASC

0d4d435ec7f5561f7c7deada0f56f16579547fa5.query:
SELECT
                    `i2`.*,
                    COUNT(`i2`.`id`) as `count`
                FROM `Item` `i`
                JOIN `Occurrence` `o` ON `i`.`id` = `o`.`item_id`
                JOIN `Occurrence` `o2` ON `o`.`comic_id` = `o2`.`comic_id`
                JOIN Item `i2` ON `o2`.`item_id` = `i2`.`id`
                WHERE `i`.`id` = ?
                    AND `i2`.`id` <> `i`.`id`
                    AND `i2`.`type` = ?
                GROUP BY `i2`.`id`
                ORDER BY `count` DESC
                LIMIT ?

13d5c565c7c14d1ba739efd311e4a7cf9ec57810.query:
SELECT
                    `item_id` AS `id`,
                    MIN(`comic_id`) AS `first`,
                    MAX(`comic_id`) AS `last`,
                    COUNT(`comic_id`) AS `count`
                FROM `Occurrence`
                WHERE `item_id` = ?

237d986df9c28980f6afd69d6e00264a3efbecec.query:
SELECT `c`.`id`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE `c`.`id` NOT IN
                    (
                        SELECT `o`.`comic_id`
                        FROM `Occurrence` `o`
                        LEFT JOIN `Item` `i` ON `o`.`item_id` = `i`.`id`
                        WHERE `i`.`type` = ?
                        AND `o`.`comic_id` = `c`.`id`
                        GROUP BY `o`.`comic_id`
                    )
                    AND `c`.`id` > ?
                    AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_cast`)
                    AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_location`)
                    AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_storyline`)
                ORDER BY `c`.`id` ASC
                LIMIT 1

2ed9909d8fcc0ea9392db5ed9cdf22621592a32b.query:
SELECT `id`
                FROM `Comic`
                WHERE `id` < ?
                    AND (? is NULL OR `is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `is_non_canon` = ?)
                ORDER BY `id` DESC

                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)
                GROUP BY i.id

                    `i`.`id` as `id`,

                FROM `Item` `i`

                JOIN `Comic` `c` ON `c`.`id` = `o`.`comic_id`
                WHERE `c`.`id` > ?
                    AND `i`.`id` IN (
                        SELECT `item_id` FROM `Occurrence` WHERE `comic_id` = ?
                    )
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)

4ce4815ef13e5765ba03166a4bf01ccb05131715.query:
SELECT `id`
                FROM `Comic`
                WHERE `id` > ?
                    AND (? is NULL OR `is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `is_non_canon` = ?)
                ORDER BY `id` ASC

5c0300a9872eb7eae79fe183530d42fac8296a03.query:
SELECT
                    `i`.`id`,
                    MIN(`c`.`id`) as `first`,
                    MAX(`c`.`id`) as `last`,
                    COUNT(`c`.`id`) as `count`
                FROM `Item` `i`
                JOIN `Occurrence` `o` ON `o`.`item_id` = `i`.`id`
                JOIN `Comic` `c` ON `c`.`id` = `o`.`comic_id`
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)
                WHERE `i`.`id` IN (
                    SELECT `item_id` FROM `Occurrence` WHERE `comic_id` = ?
                )
                GROUP by `i`.`id`
                ORDER BY `count` DESC

5d84c073158e82b635b5e2ab987278ac5d07c779.query:
SELECT
                    `t`.`identifier`,
                    `l`.`date_time`,
                    `l`.`action`
                FROM `LogEntry` `l`
                JOIN `Token` `t` ON `t`.`id` = `l`.`user_token`
                ORDER BY `date_time` DESC
                LIMIT ?, ?

645cc943e9a4cd11a4d04b121553e409c48575cc.query:
SELECT `c`.`id`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE `c`.`id` NOT IN
                    (
                        SELECT `o`.`comic_id`
                        FROM `Occurrence` `o`
                        LEFT JOIN `Item` `i` ON `o`.`item_id` = `i`.`id`
                        WHERE `i`.`type` = ?
                        AND `o`.`comic_id` = `c`.`id`
                        GROUP BY `o`.`comic_id`
                    )
                    AND `c`.`id` < ?
                    AND (? <> 'cast' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_cast`)
                    AND (? <> 'location' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_location`)
                    AND (? <> 'storyline' OR NOT `c`.`has_no_storyline`)
                ORDER BY c.id DESC
                LIMIT 1

865e70b564410b936214fc3cce51bf32f9601555.query:
SELECT
                    MIN(`c`.`id`) as `first`,
                    MAX(`c`.`id`) as `last`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE (`c`.`tagline` IS NULL or NULLIF(`c`.`tagline`, '') IS NULL)
                    AND NOT `c`.`has_no_tagline`
                    AND `c`.`id` > 3132

8b91655dc647ad29f6e9d06dd17d2ba228f2f595.query:
SELECT
                    MIN(`c`.`id`) as `first`,
                    MAX(`c`.`id`) as `last`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE (`c`.`title` IS NULL or NULLIF(`c`.`title`, '') IS NULL)
                    AND NOT `c`.`has_no_title`

                    )
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_guest_comic` = ?)
                    AND (? is NULL OR `c`.`is_non_canon` = ?)
                GROUP BY `i`.`id`

b00505c24f3d9df6d6b33497ac4f7b2cced843bf.query:
SELECT `c`.`id`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE (`c`.`tagline` IS NULL OR NULLIF(c.`tagline`, '') IS NULL)
                    AND NOT `c`.`has_no_tagline`
                    AND `c`.`id` > ?
                    AND `c`.`id` > 3132
                ORDER BY `c`.`id` ASC
                LIMIT 1

edab75d172957dc53f96952947de6c97fac5a36b.query:
SELECT `c`.`id`
                FROM `Comic` `c`
                WHERE (`c`.`title` IS NULL OR NULLIF(`c`.`title`, '') IS NULL)
                    AND NOT `c`.`has_no_title`
                    AND `c`.`id` < ?
                ORDER BY `c`.`id` DESC

fb720226ca224bbdeb08d470a574ce5dfadb85fd.query:
INSERT INTO `Comic`
                    (`id`, `title`, `image_type`, `publish_date`, `is_accurate_publish_date`)
                VALUES
                    (?, ?, ?, ?, 1)
                ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
                    `title` = ?,
                    `image_type` = ?,
                    `publish_date` = ?
